    • str2data

      public static Vector str2data(String aStr, int aLength)
      针对 lammps 等软件输出文件中存在的使用空格分割的数据专门优化的读取操作， 使用 groovy-json 中现成的 parseDouble 等方法，总体比直接 split 并用 java 的 parseDouble 快一倍以上；

      现在兼容考虑逗号分割的情况，并同时运用在 csv 的读取上

      现在读取失败会存为 Double.NaN 而不是抛出错误

    • isBlank

      @Contract("null -> true") public static boolean isBlank(CharSequence self)
      useful methods, wrapper of StringGroovyMethods stuffs

    • containsIgnoreCase

      public static boolean containsIgnoreCase(CharSequence self, CharSequence searchString)

    • findLineContaining

      public static int findLineContaining(List<String> aLines, int aStartIdx, String aContainStr, boolean aIgnoreCase)
      Start from aStartIdx to find the first index containing aContainStr
      参数:
      aLines - where to find the aContainStr
      aStartIdx - the start position, include
      aContainStr - a string to find in aLines
      aIgnoreCase - if true, ignore case when comparing characters
      返回:
      the idx of aLines which contains aContainStr, or aLines.length if not find

    • findLineContaining

      public static int findLineContaining(List<String> aLines, int aStartIdx, String aContainStr)

    • splitBlank

      public static String[] splitBlank(String aStr)
      Splits a string separated by blank characters into multiple strings

      will automatically ignores multiple spaces and the beginning and end spaces

      参数:
      aStr - input string
      返回:
      the split sting in array

    • splitComma

      public static String[] splitComma(String aStr)
      Splits a string separated by comma(",") characters into multiple strings

      will automatically ignores multiple spaces

      参数:
      aStr - input string
      返回:
      the split sting in array

    • splitStr

      @Experimental public static String[] splitStr(String aStr)
      匹配使用空格分割或者逗号（,）分割的字符串，可以出现混合

      会自动忽略多余的空格

      参数:
      aStr - input string
      返回:
      the split sting in array

    • splitNodeList

      public static List<String> splitNodeList(String aRawNodeList)
      Java version of splitNodeList
      参数:
      aRawNodeList - input raw node list from $SLURM_JOB_NODELIST
      返回:
      split node list
